code: import React,{useEffect}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import'./Main.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Main=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLoginClick=()=>{navigate("/login");};const handleRegisterClick=()=>{navigate("/register");};useEffect(()=>{if(localStorage.getItem("secret-key-admin")){navigate("/admin");}else if(localStorage.getItem("secret-key")){navigate("/instructor");}},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"main-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"overlay",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"message",children:"Welcome to Course Schedule"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"course-image",src:"https://cdn.dribbble.com/users/2272835/screenshots/9602204/online_register.gif",alt:"welcome gif"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"button-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button",onClick:handleLoginClick,children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button",onClick:handleRegisterClick,children:"Register"})]})]})});};export default Main;
